content: work 11 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row decrease row k1 ssk k until 3 sts remaining k2tog k1 turn repeat the last twelve row 2 more times work 9 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row you should have 102 sts do not break yarn continue with body all other sizes work - - 51 45 37 31 43 37 29 row of stockinette flat starting with a ws row increase row rs k2 m1l k until 2 sts remaining m1r k2 turn next row p to end turn repeat the last 2 row - - 4 9 14 19 14 19 24 more times you should have - - 118 128 138 148 154 164 174 sts do not break yarn continue with body body you will join the back and front pieces together and knit in the round for the body continuing from the back piece knit across all sts using the working yarn cast on - - - - - - 4 4 4 sts for the underarm cable cast on is suggested for structural strength knit across held sts of the front piece using the working yarn cast on - - - - - - 4 4 4 sts for the underarm join in the round and place bor marker you should have 192 204 236 256 276 296 316 336 356 sts wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com setup round for placing markers k 14 16 16 17 17 18 24 25 25 sts pm k25 26 28 29 30 31 34 35 36 sts pm k25 26 28 29 30 31 34 35 36 sts pm k46 50 62 70 78 86 90 98 106 sts pm k25 26 28 29 30 31 34 35 36 sts pm k25 26 28 29 30 31 34 35 36 sts pm k32 34 46 53 61 68 66 73 81 sts to bor knit 17 17 19 19 22 22 24 24 26 rounds of stockinette you will begin adding cables to the body round 1 k to m sm 6/6 lc 6 times k to end round 2 to 6 knit in stockinette round 7 k to m sm k6 6/6 rc 6 times k to end round 8 to 12 knit in stockinette round 13 to 24 repeat round 1 to 12 you may modify to add length to the body by repeating round 1 to 12 until desired length is reached do note that you will need more yarn if you do so switch to 3 5 mm needles 2x2 rib k2 p2 to end repeat the above round 7 more times or until hem measures 1 inch thick bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn neckband with 3 5 mm needles starting from the back right corner of the neckline pick up and knit sts at the following rates 1 st for every 1 st along the back approximately 53 sts 2
